titles.title: Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act
PRISM Act
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act
PRISM Act
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act
PRISM Act
To amend title 54, United States Code, to make Hispanic-serving institutions eligible for technical and financial assistance for the establishment of preservation training and degree programs.
PRISM Act

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 207.

action.text: Mr. LaMalfa moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.

DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1541.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on September 30, 2015. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Preservation Research at Institutions Serving Minorities Act or the PRISM Act
(Sec. 2) This bill makes Hispanic-serving institutions and Asian American and Native American Pacific Islander-serving institutions of higher education eligible for technical and financial assistance from the Department of the Interior to establish preservation training and degree programs.
